title: Classic profiteroles
ingredients: ['Choux pastry', '250ml (8 fl oz) water', '125g (4¼ oz) butter', '125g (4¼ oz) plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '4 eggs', 'Filling', '450ml (16 fl oz) double cream', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Topping', '75g (3 oz) plain chocolate']
